article_title: Woman Jumps Off Roof of Celebrity Plastic Surgeon's Office
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

A woman jumped to her death earlier this week after getting a facelift from a renowned plastic surgeon to the stars.

The 53-year-old was on the roof of the Camden Medical Arts building in Beverly Hills for several hours Wednesday before she jumped.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

The unidentified woman was reportedly a patient of Dr. Brian Novack, considered one of the best – and most expensive – doctors specializing in keeping Hollywood A-listers looking eternally young. The Hollywood Reporter has learned that Novack’s tragic mystery patient had been staying overnight under supervision at his sleek clinic on North Camden Drive in Beverly Hills following a facelift procedure.

The outlet said blonde, Caucasian patient left Dr. Novack’s office, shed her hospital gown and ran up five stories to the roof.
